headline: Traditional Brunswick Stew
name: Traditional Brunswick Stew
description: This simple, hearty stew consists of chicken and salt pork with potatoes, beans and other vegetables seasoned with Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.
recipeIngredient: 1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot over high heat, combine the salt pork, chicken and water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 45 minutes, or until chicken is tender.
Remove chicken and allow to cool until easy to handle. Remove meat and discard the skin and bones. Chop meat into bite size pieces and return to the soup.
Add the potatoes, onions, tomatoes, corn, lima beans, Worcestershire sauce, salt and ground black pepper. Stir well and simmer, uncovered, for 1 hour.
